fe.totalTransactionsTooltip: Total number of transactions (both income and expenses) you have made in the current month. Helps track your transaction frequency.
fe.highestTransactionTooltip: Transaction with the highest value in the month (can be income or expense). Helps identify unusual large amounts.
fe.lowestTransactionTooltip: Transaction with the lowest value in the month (can be income or expense). Helps identify recurring small expenses.
fe.avgExpenseTooltip: Average amount per expense (Total Expense / Number of expense transactions). Helps you understand your average spending scale.
fe.savingsRateTooltip: The percentage of money you save compared to income ((Income - Expense) / Income Ã— 100%). Higher is better, should maintain above 20%.
fe.popularCategoryTooltip: Category with the highest total amount in the month. Helps you identify your largest spending area or income source.

fe.description: Analyze your financial data with statistics and insights.
Manage income and expenses to track your personal finances.
fe.addTransactionDescription: Add your income or expense to track your personal finances.
fe.descriptionPlaceholder: Enter a description for the transaction...
fe.deleteTransactionDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the transaction "{description}"? This action cannot be undone.

be.transactionDeleteFailed: Failed to delete transaction! Please try again later.

fe.description: Manage custom categories for your transactions.

be.categoryNotFoundOrNoPermissionDelete: Category not found or you don't have permission to delete!
be.categoryInUseWithCountTransaction: Cannot delete category. There are {count} transactions using this category. Please delete those transactions first.
be.categoryInUseWithCountBudget: Cannot delete category. There are {count} budgets using this category. Please delete those budgets first.

salaryBonus.label: Salary & Bonus
salaryBonus.description: Base salary, performance bonus, holiday bonus, allowances, etc.

businessFreelance.label: Business & Freelance
businessFreelance.description: Sales revenue, services, freelance, short-term contracts, etc.

investmentPassive.label: Investment & Passive Income
investmentPassive.description: Savings interest, dividends, bonds interest, rental, royalties, etc.

giftSupport.label: Gifts & Support
giftSupport.description: Cash gifts, family support, celebration money, etc.

otherIncome.label: Other Income
otherIncome.description: Refunds, selling used items, prizes, unexpected amounts, etc.

foodBeverage.label: Food & Beverage
foodBeverage.description: Groceries, markets, restaurants, cafes, breakfast/lunch/dinner, etc.

transportation.label: Transportation
transportation.description: Fuel, bus/grab, vehicle maintenance, parking fees, etc.

personalCare.label: Personal Care
personalCare.description: Haircut, manicure, spa, massage, hair dye, skincare, etc.

shopping.label: Shopping
shopping.description: Clothes, shoes, cosmetics, accessories, electronics, household items, etc.

familySupport.label: Family Support
familySupport.description: Money for parents, support for siblings, relatives, etc.

housing.label: Housing & Utilities
housing.description: Rent, electricity, water, gas, internet, phone, management fees, etc.

healthcareInsurance.label: Healthcare & Insurance
healthcareInsurance.description: Medical visits, medicine, health/life insurance, etc.

educationDevelopment.label: Education & Development
educationDevelopment.description: Tuition, books, online/offline courses, certificates, seminars, etc.

entertainmentLeisure.label: Entertainment & Leisure
entertainmentLeisure.description: Travel, movies, music, games, gym, hobbies, etc.

socialGifts.label: Social & Gifts
socialGifts.description: Weddings, funerals, birthdays, gifts for friends, gatherings, etc.

savingsInvestment.label: Savings & Investment
savingsInvestment.description: Savings, stocks, funds, real estate, crypto, emergency fund, etc.

debtPayment.label: Debt Payment
debtPayment.description: Bank loan payments, credit cards, personal debts, etc.

otherExpense.label: Other Expenses
otherExpense.description: Unexpected repairs, fines, losses, unidentified expenses, etc.

notFound.title: PAGE NOT FOUND
notFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist.

signIn.passwordRequired: Password must have at least 8 characters, including uppercase, lowercase, number and special character.

password.newPasswordRequired: Password must have at least 8 characters, including uppercase, lowercase, number and special character.

transaction.descriptionMaxLength: Description must be at most 200 characters.

category.categoryNameMaxLength: Category name must be at most 50 characters.
category.categoryDescriptionMaxLength: Description must be at most 200 characters.

budget.endDateMustBeAfterStartDate: End date must be after start date.
